articles.title: Terence Crawford shows he's on a level all on his own with one-sided beatdown of Jeff Horn
articles.description: Terence Crawford, right, lands a punch on Jeff Horn, of Australia, in a welterweight title boxing match, Saturday, June 9, 2018, in Las Vegas.  LAS VEGAS — Three things were plainly obvious Saturday from Terence Crawford’s destruction of Jeff Horn in their WB…

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/griff.witte
articles.title: European leaders are outraged by Trump over G-7 statement. But they're not surprised.
articles.description: The president’s last-minute refusal to sign the joint statement with America’s closest allies was met with shock but also resignation in Europe, where leaders have grudgingly accepted an increasingly isolated U.S. presence on the world stage.

articles.author: Mohammed Tawfeeq, Samantha Beech and Angela Dewan, CNN
articles.title: Putin ready to meet Trump over arms race concerns
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Sunday he was ready for a face-to-face meeting with US President Donald Trump over the dangers of a new arms race.

articles.title: SCO summit LIVE: PM Modi says connectivity with neighbouring nations top priority
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping, also host of the 18th Shanghai Cooperation Organisation summit, in his opening remarks says presence of PM Narendra Modi and Pakistan President Hussain is of great historic significance. Here are the live updates:

articles.author: Amy Lieu
articles.title: Helicopter plunges into Wisconsin river, killing man
articles.description: An unidentified man was killed when a helicopter hit power lines and plunged into a Wisconsin river on Saturday, officials said.

articles.author: Bradford Betz
articles.title: Soldier killed in Somalia ID'd as 8-year Army veteran from Arizona
articles.description: The U.S. soldier who was killed during an ambush attack in Somalia on Friday has been identifed as an eight-year Army veteran from Arizona who had previously served in Afghanistan.

articles.author: John Cherwa
articles.title: The shadow of American Pharoah lingers over Justify's Triple Crown
articles.description: Justify becoming the 13th horse to win racing’s Triple Crown is dripping in history. It’s why 90,327 people came to Long Island’s Belmont Park on Saturday. They wanted to witness something they have never seen before, that is unless they were at Belmont Park …

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Leave.EU 'downplayed Russian links'
articles.description: It is reported that leave campaigner Arron Banks held undisclosed meetings with Russia in 2016.

articles.title: Twitter reacts to CM Punk's ugly, bloody loss to Mike Jackson at UFC 225

articles.author: Amir Vera, CNN
articles.title: NYC pizza delivery man given emergency stay after immigration detention
articles.description: Pablo Villavicencio, who was detained after trying to deliver a pizza to a military base in Brooklyn, was granted the stay until July 20.

articles.author: Tamoor Hussain
articles.title: E3 2018: EA Play Press Conference Shows The Loot Box Backlash Paid Off
articles.description: The biggest upcoming PS4, Xbox One, and PC games from EA, including Battlefield 5 and Anthem, won't make the same mistakes Battlefront 2 did.

articles.author: Michael Kaplan
articles.title: Anthony Bourdain was 'regularly suicidal' after end of first marriage
articles.description: On TV shows such as “No Reservations” and “Parts Unknown,” chef Anthony Bourdain presented the image of an alpha male of the world. Beneath the swagger and mischievous grin, however, loomed a …

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Chinese hackers reportedly stole a bunch of highly sensitive undersea warfare data from a US Navy contractor
articles.description: Including plans for a supersonic anti-ship missile for use on U.S. submarines, signals and sensor data, submarine radio room information relating to cryptographic systems and the Navy submarine development unit’s electronic warfare, according to the report.

articles.author: Roberta Rampton
articles.title: Trump torpedoes G7 effort to ease trade spat, threatens auto tariffs
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday threw the G7’s efforts to show a united front into disarray after he became angry with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, and said he might double down on import tariffs by hitting the sensitive auto industry.

articles.author: CBS/AP
articles.title: Search teams find body of woman missing in suspected alligator attack
articles.description: Matsuki, who disappeared while walking her dogs, was bitten and likely killed by an alligator that was later captured, wildlife officials said Friday

articles.author: Suman Varandani
articles.title: Mystery Biblical King's 3000-Year-Old Sculpted Head Unearthed
articles.description: The figurine was unearthed at a site called Abel Beth Maacah, located just south of Israel’s border with Lebanon.

articles.author: http://www.facebook.com/matt.zapotosky, https://www.facebook.com/wapolynh
articles.title: In charging Senate staffer and seizing reporter's records, Justice Dept. ignites debate over leak crackdown
articles.description: Critics worry that the moves will have a chilling effect on newsgathering.

articles.title: 'You've handed us an issue': Democrats pounce on Trump administration's health-care move
articles.description: Republicans were caught off guard by the administration’s decision to abandon a popular element of the Affordable Care Act — protections for people with preexisting medical conditions.
